characters.name: Ursula the Star
characters.description: A cute, five-pointed star with a radiant yellow glow. Each point of the star is perfectly symmetrical with a slight rounded contour for a more friendly appearance. It has a subtle shimmer effect, making it appear almost alive. Ursula has a small, smiling face with two bright, twinkling eyes located on the middle part of the star.

scenes.background_description: A vast starlit sky with countless twinkling stars scattered across the dark canvas, creating a sense of infinity. In the middle of the scene, there is a particularly bright and cute star with a gentle luminescence that sets it apart from the rest. The scene is designed with a dreamy quality, with soft, glowing tones and a sense of wonder.
scenes.narration_text: Once upon a time, there was a cute and curious star named Ursula who lived among the cosmos.

scenes.background_description: A vibrant meadow during sunset with rolling green hills and a sky painted in hues of orange, pink, and purple. Wildflowers of various colors are swaying gently in the breeze. In the sky, Ursula the Star, emitting a warm glow, is descending to explore the beautiful earth below.
scenes.narration_text: Feeling adventurous, Ursula decided to travel through the world, eager to see the wonders it held.

test_criteria.lighting: warm glow of sunset and star

scenes.background_description: A bustling village at dusk, illuminated by the warm glow of lanterns and street lamps. People and animals are engaging in evening activities, creating a lively atmosphere. Ursula the Star, still glowing brightly, floats above, observing the joyful bustle below.
scenes.narration_text: As Ursula moved closer to the earth, she found a village filled with friends she had yet to meet, each as interesting and diverse as the stars in her own sky.

test_criteria.lighting: warm glow of lanterns and star

scenes.background_description: A cozy forest clearing under a starry night sky, surrounded by tall whispering pines and a gentle brook flowing nearby. Creatures of the forest gather, intrigued by the glowing presence of Ursula, hovering like a beacon in the night.
scenes.narration_text: Ursula shared her light with the creatures of the forest, enjoying their company and learning of their stories.

test_criteria.lighting: gentle glow of star and moonlight
